text.section:
The board shall promulgate administrative regulations that establish fees for the following services. These fees shall not exceed the following:
For processing the application for the examination ................................... $200
For a license certificate upon satisfactorily passing the examination ............ 50
For the restoration of a voluntarily surrendered license ...............................300
For a license to an architect satisfactorily licensed in another state or country .......................................................................250
For reinstatement of a license revoked for failure to pay the annual renewal fee or suspended by the board, in addition to application and arrears as determined by the board .........................300
Renewal certificate .......................................................................................250
The proper fee as prescribed above shall be paid to the board, and shall not be refunded in whole or in part.
The cost of taking the examination shall be borne by the applicant.

law.history: Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 53, sec. 2, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 190, sec. 4, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 201, sec. 2. -- Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 218, sec. 6, effective June 16, 1960. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 73-11, 73-13.
